concept.title: Creating a node with a human readable name and IP address
concept.shortdesc: With version 2 of the inventory file, you can create a node with a human readable name even when an IP address is used for connecting.

conbody.p: You do so by setting both a uri and name, or by setting host in the transport config in addition to the name. targets: - name: my_device config: transport: remote remote: host: 192.168.100.179 - name: my_device2 uri: 192.168.100.179
